message: Hi Bob, I have a unique and valuable product that I think you'll be interested in. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I am interested, but I can only pay $120 for it.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would be willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $142, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to propose $140 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm at my absolute minimum price. I can offer it to you for $145, but that's it. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.
Considering the value I see in the product, I would like to propose $143 for the product.
I've made it clear what I'm willing to sell it for, Bob. I'm not budging from $150. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
